title: Motion sense stopped working
content:
1. I bought a phone and motion sense was working. e.g. skip song, Pikachu waves back and so on.
2. I went to Jordan where motion sense is not available, no big deal. I was informed that this sensor is not available in this country so it's ok.
3. I went back to my country after a holidays, turned on motion sense on again. Switch in the settings shows it's tuned on, but pikachu wallpaper does not wave me back and song skip does not work anymore. I can't see any errors... Tried restarting and updating the phone with no luck...
